detail_description: Orkid Ria Seafood Restaurant is a Chinese open-air eatery located on Jalan Pantai Cenang, offering a delightful experience for seafood enthusiasts. The restaurant is known for its delectable chilli crab and steamed tilapia. Visitors appreciate the fusion of locally grown produce with fresh seafood to create inspiring blackboard specials.
name: Orkid Ria Seafood Restaurant
address: Lot 418, Jalan Pantai Tengah, Jl. Teluk Baru, Mukim Kedawang, 07100 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

excerpt: Laid-back option for light American & European eats, including vegan & gluten-free items.
detail_description: Red Tomato Langkawi offers a relaxed atmosphere and a diverse menu featuring American and European cuisine, with options for vegans and those with gluten-free diets. The restaurant's vibrant decor resembles a Spanish hacienda, complete with colorful walls, stained-glass pendant lamps, and unique decorative elements like bird cages and cactus pots. Known for serving some of the best Western food on the island, it is a popular breakfast spot renowned for its sweet banana pancakes.
name: Red Tomato Langkawi
address: No. 5 Casa Fina, Jalan Pantai Cenang, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: THE CLIFF BEACH RESTAURANT SDN BHD (1329221-U) is a stunning culinary destination that combines Malay, Asian, and Western flavors with breathtaking views of the Andaman Sea. With its contemporary design and outdoor seating offering panoramic sunset views, it's an ideal spot for any celebration or romantic dinner. The restaurant's open-air indoor dining area features modern furnishings and classy decor, providing an unforgettable dining experience.
name: THE CLIFF BEACH RESTAURANT SDN BHD (1329221-U)
address: Lot 63 & 40, Cenang, Mukim Kedawang, Lebuh Pantai, 07000 Pulau Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Yellow Beach Cafe, located in the sought-after area of Pantai Cenang, Langkawi, offers a vibrant and inviting beachside dining experience. The cafe boasts a cheerful yellow-themed decor and provides a diverse menu with options ranging from main dishes, pizzas, and salads to an array of beverages and desserts. Additionally, the cafe caters to various dietary preferences including vegan options. Guests can also enjoy shisha offerings at this lively establishment.
name: Yellow Beach Cafe
address: Jalan Pantai Cenang, Pantai Cenang, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Haroo Korean Restaurant is a must-visit for authentic and delicious Korean food in Langkawi. The portions are generous, and the food is flavorful without being too heavy or oily. The service is top-notch, with accommodating staff who go the extra mile to ensure a great dining experience. The menu offers a variety of options, including vegetarian and vegan dishes that are prepared with fresh ingredients.
name: Haroo Korean Restaurant
address: Lot 31, Jalan Pantai Tengah, Jl. Teluk Baru, Mukim kedawang, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Wonderland Food Store is a popular open-air restaurant known for its budget-friendly and delicious seafood, as well as chicken and vegetable dishes prepared in Chinese style. The casual atmosphere and great value for money have made it a hit among both locals and tourists. Diners highly recommend the softshell crab with salted egg yolk, butter prawns, and steamed grouper dish. The friendly staff provide helpful recommendations on choosing the best seafood options, ensuring a satisfying dining experience.
name: Wonderland Food Store
address: 179;181, 07000, 180, Persiaran Mutiara 2, Pusat Perdagangan Kelana Mas, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Fat Cupid - Cafe & Restaurant is a hidden gem near Tengah beach, offering a peaceful and beautiful atmosphere under the trees. The friendly staff provides great advice and service, making it perfect for groups. The food is veggie-loaded, with dishes like Laksa filled with long beans and tau geh. While the kuah may be on the heavier side, the beef hor fun is a treat for beef lovers with its large slices of beef.
name: FatCupid - Cafe & Restaurant
address: Lot 2273, Kampung Tasek Anak, La Pari-Pari Resort, Jalan Pantai Tengah, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Yasmin Syrian Restaurant المطعم السوري ياسمين is a newly opened dining spot located across from Orchid Ria. The restaurant offers an intimate atmosphere and attentive service, ensuring that your meal arrives promptly, often before you can finish a glass of freshly squeezed mango or pineapple juice. The open kitchen allows diners to interact with the kitchen staff, who are eager to please.
name: Yasmin Syrian Restaurant المطعم السوري ياسمين
address: Pantai cenang, Kampung Lubok Buaya, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Cactus is a hidden gem in Langkawi, offering a variety of delicious Malaysian dishes. The restaurant provides friendly service and an authentic dining experience. Diners recommend trying the deep-fried calamari, sizzling beef, and ABC barracuda. The menu features a great selection of dishes, and the staff is always accommodating. Visitors praise the fresh and reasonably priced food at Cactus, making it a must-visit spot for those traveling to Langkawi.
name: Cactus Restaurant
address: Lot 1698, Jalan Pantai Tengah, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Putumayo Restaurant is a popular choice along the touristy strip in Langkawi, known for its open-air terrace that creates a relaxed and laid-back atmosphere, perfect for enjoying afternoon Tiger beers. The restaurant stands out for its excellent service and inviting ambiance. For those seeking an evening dining experience, Red Sky is another option nearby, offering a variety of curries. However, Putumayo's atmosphere and service make it a standout choice.
name: Putumayo Restaurant 复古海滨餐厅
address: Pantai Chenang, Lot 1584, Jalan Pantai Chenang, Mukim Kedawang, 07000 Pulau Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Bambooba Bistro Langkawi is a fantastic place to unwind and enjoy delicious food at reasonable prices. The staff is friendly and accommodating, ensuring a pleasant dining experience. With indoor and outdoor seating, it offers a comfortable atmosphere for patrons to relax. Guests can also engage in activities like playing pool or darts while enjoying vibrant drinks. The bistro's menu features homemade sandwiches, comfort food, freshly made pizzas, burgers, salads, and delightful desserts like chocolate cake.
name: Bambooba Bistro langkawi
address: No, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: "Pia's the Padi" is a charming restaurant that offers a fusion of Malay, Indian, Chinese, and international cuisine. The ambiance is enhanced by beautiful decor and water features, creating a delightful dining experience. Guests can enjoy top-quality, fresh, and flavorful dishes such as pakoras and beef rendang. The friendly service adds to the welcoming atmosphere.
name: Pia's the Padi
address: Jalan Ulu Melaka, Kampung Padang Gaong, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

name: Scarborough Fish & Chips- Tanjung Rhu
address: Lot 1388, Jalan Tanjung Rhu, Mukim Air Hangat, 07100 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Alhamdulillah Restaurant is a must-visit in Langkawi, conveniently located near the iconic Big Eagle and Jetty Point. The Syrian owner takes pride in serving fresh and delicious Middle Eastern cuisine at fair prices. Visitors rave about the amazing food and great service, with some even returning multiple times during their stay. The restaurant's beautiful atmosphere adds to the dining experience, making it a top choice for lunch or dinner while in Kuah.
name: Al Medan Syrian Restaurant
address: Lot 5, Persiaran dayang Pekan Rabu - baru Baron Kuah, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Restoran Nasi Kandar Tomato offers a wide selection of local dishes in a spacious open area with 24-hour service. While the staff may be slow and inattentive, the delicious food and great value make it worth the wait. The restaurant is known for its efficient service and tasty meals at very affordable prices. Additionally, there's free wifi available for patrons while they wait for their orders.
name: Restoran Nasi Kandar Tomato
address: Jalan Pantai Chenang, Pantai Cenang, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: The Argan Trees in Langkawi is a European-style restaurant with Moroccan influences, owned by a family from Luxembourg. Despite its Moroccan ambiance, the menu offers European cuisine of high quality. The service is excellent and the food preparation time is short. Visitors praise the friendly owners and recommend trying the intense flavors of their dishes. It's a great option for those seeking a break from Malaysian cuisine, offering delicious Italian food such as calamari, carbonara, and eggplant pasta.
name: The Argan Trees langkawi
address: Sun Block, Jl. Teluk Baru, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Cba Restaurant, located in Pelangi Resort, offers a picturesque setting for a sunset dinner by the beach. Guests can book a beachfront table in advance to enjoy the stunning views. The restaurant serves a BBQ buffet dinner along with a variety of dishes such as pizza, fish tapas, and portobello mushroom spaghetti. While the staff is described as efficient and friendly, there are some comments about communication issues. However, the overall dining experience is enhanced by live music performances.
name: Cba Restaurant
address: 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

name: Pahn-Thai Restaurant
address: Berjaya Langkawi Resort Burau Bay, 07000 Pulau Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Unkaizan Japanese Restaurant is a top choice for Japanese cuisine in Langkawi. The service is exceptional, with friendly and attentive staff who ensure a pleasant dining experience. While the prices are slightly high, they are fair for Japanese food on an island. The food presentation is impressive, especially the set meals, and the quality of sashimi and sushi is noteworthy. The grilled live snapper comes highly recommended for its moist and sweet meat.
name: Unkaizan Japanese Restaurant
address: Jalan Pantai Tengah, Pantai Tengah, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Jala Restaurant is a captivating dining spot with an exotic ambiance and delectable cuisine. The menu features a la carte options, including the fresh catch of the day, which can be prepared to your preference and served with two sauces and three side dishes. The skilled chefs are known for suggesting the best cooking method based on the fish's flavor profile and texture. Guests praise the excellent service and recommend trying dishes like deep-fried and grilled red snapper.
name: Jala Restaurant
address: The Andaman Langkawi, Jln Teluk Datai, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Nam Restaurant offers a beautiful setting and attentive staff, making it an ideal spot for a romantic dinner. The menu features delicious Western dishes, with the apple and macadamia nut pudding standing out as a must-try dessert. While the menu is predominantly Western, the Malaysian main course is highly recommended. Despite a reduced menu due to chef shortage, the ambiance is quaint and peaceful, offering views of the lake and pool.
name: Nam Restaurant
address: Bon Ton Restaurant & Resort Pantai Cenang, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Mangoes Bar & Grill is a charming and intimate establishment owned by an Australian lady, but managed by Chris, an English lady. The place attracts a diverse crowd, from Caucasian retirees to tourists. Tucked away next to a white house amidst lush greenery, the restaurant offers a limited menu due to its recent reopening post-pandemic. Guests rave about the delicious food, particularly recommending the Lamb Shank and thick French fries.
name: Mangoes Bar & Grill
address: 1, Jalan Kuala Teriang, Padang Matsirat, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Arts Cafe Langkawi is a charming spot with a diverse menu and friendly staff. The cozy downstairs area offers comfortable seating and air conditioning, while the upstairs exudes a homely vibe despite lacking AC. Prices are reasonable, albeit slightly higher than average due to the limited availability of Western dishes in the area. The cafe boasts high-speed free wifi and accepts card payments. It's also adorned with stunning real paintings that add to its inviting atmosphere.
name: Arts Cafe Langkawi (KV0014341-P)
address: 54, Jalan Pandak Mayah 5 Kuah, 07000 Kuah, Kedah, Malaysia

name: Colonial India Restaurant
address: 40, Jl. Teluk Baru, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Rimba Restaurant at Ambong Pool Villas offers a stunning sunset view, making it an ideal spot for a romantic dinner. The restaurant is set in a jungle with sea views, providing a peaceful and relaxing atmosphere. However, some guests noted that the staff's loud chatter disrupted the tranquility. The food is described as unique and delicious, with generous portions such as the oxtail soup and skewers.
name: Rimba Restaurant at Ambong Pool Villas
address: Ambong Pool Villas, Jl. Teluk Baru, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: India Palace Restaurant in Pantai Cenang offers a delightful dining experience with warm and friendly service. The ambiance is inviting, and the staff ensures that every guest has an incredible time. The food is delicious, especially the Gobi65 with mint chutney and well-cooked Masala dishes. Vegetarian options are also available, making it a must-visit for those seeking charming atmosphere and good Indian cuisine.
name: India Palace Restaurant
address: 2, Jalan Pantai Chenang, Kampung Lubok Buaya, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Telaga Seafood Restaurant is a top choice for those seeking the best dining experience in Langkawi. Nestled in the midst of Pantai Cenang, this restaurant offers a serene tropical atmosphere shielded by lush foliage. The menu features a variety of Western and local dishes, including seafood delights like grilled fish, prawns, and crabs. Guests can enjoy their meals while taking in the stunning sea views.
name: Telaga Seafood Restaurant
address: Jalan Pantai Chenang, Kampung Lubok Buaya, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

excerpt: Asian, Western & other global fare, plus cocktails, in a contemporary setup with outdoor seating.
detail_description: Red Sky Restaurant & Bar offers a diverse menu featuring Asian, Western, and global cuisine along with a variety of cocktails in a modern setting that includes outdoor seating. It is popular among both locals and tourists for casual lunches or evening gatherings. The restaurant provides indoor and outdoor seating as well as a full bar for enjoying cocktails. Guests can enjoy an extensive selection of appetizers and main courses representing flavors from Malaysia, Mexico, India, and Continental Cuisine.
name: Red Sky Restaurant & Bar
address: Red Sky @ Villa Molek Jalan Teluk Baru, Jalan Pantai Tengah, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Planter's at The Danna Langkawi offers a delightful international breakfast buffet with bottomless sparkling wine, making it an ideal way to kick off your day in Langkawi. The buffet features a mix of local and international delicacies, including nasi lemak, roti canai, porridges, as well as standard Western fare and cold plates with a variety of hams and cheeses. Guests have praised the splendid breakfast spread and the attentive staff.
name: Planter's at The Danna Langkawi
address: The Danna Langkawi, Telaga Harbour Park, Pantai Kok, 07000, Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia, 07000 Langkawi, Malaysia

detail_description: Maroush Restaurant, situated in Pantai Cenang, stands out among other Indian and Arabic cuisine spots due to the owner's philosophy of treating all customers with equal attention. The restaurant offers a delightful dinner experience with its cool ambiance and convenient location near various attractions. While the prices may be slightly high, the excellent service compensates for it.
name: Maroush Restaurant
address: Lot 6&7, Landcon Resort, Jalan Pantai Chenang, Kampung Lubok Buaya, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Langkawi Kitchen at the Ritz-Carlton is a must-visit for an exceptional dining experience. Guests rave about the specially made desserts and drinks, as well as the top-notch breakfast buffet. The Ramadan Buffet is particularly outstanding. The restaurant offers a unique take on Malaysian cuisine, with highlights such as mutton rendang and eggplant Belado. The staff's hospitality adds to the welcoming atmosphere, making it worth every penny.
name: Langkawi Kitchen
address: The Ritz-Carlton, Langkawi, PT 313, Jalan Pantai Kok, Teluk Nibong, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Viva Italia Restaurant is a must-visit dining spot with amazing food and exceptional service. The staff are incredibly friendly and helpful, making the dining experience even more enjoyable. Their menu boasts delicious options like steak, pizza, pasta, salmon, and Indian cuisine. The creamy spaghetti carbonara and chicken parmigiana are particularly outstanding. The restaurant's interior design creates a relaxing atmosphere while enjoying your meal.
name: Viva Italia Restaurant
address: Pantai Cenang, Kampung Lubok Buaya, 07000 Pulau Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

name: The Terrace at The Danna
address: Kampung Kok, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Hidden Langkawi is a serene escape from the bustling crowds, offering tranquil and untouched natural beauty. The largest group of islands in Malaysia, it boasts gentle beaches and cool blue waters. Additionally, it features a mesmerizing restaurant near Pantai Tengah with a soothing ambiance and fantastic dining experience. While the food is described as standard Western fare, the overall experience is praised for its unique charm and occasional fire shows in the evening.
name: Hidden Langkawi
address: 2461, Jalan Pantai Tengah, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Gallo Nero Italian Restaurant is a fabulous dining spot on Langkawi Island, offering authentic and exquisite Italian dishes. The food is fresh, flavorful, and truly divine. The friendly and professional staff provide attentive service, with the head chef occasionally greeting patrons. The menu goes beyond pasta and pizza to include delicious options like tuna steak and tender lamb shank. While some dishes may have minor imperfections, the overall experience is wonderful and memorable for anyone seeking fine Italian dining in Langkawi.
name: Gallo Nero Italian Restaurant
address: 19, Bandar, Jalan Padang Matsirat, Kampung Padang Mat Sirat, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: German Food Corner (1024783-W) is a hidden gem located in Langkawi's Oriental Village. Despite its unassuming appearance, the food here exceeds expectations. The generous portions and fresh ingredients make for a satisfying dining experience. The friendly hosts are accommodating and provide helpful recommendations. Dishes like beef goulash, chicken schnitzel, and prawn salad showcase the care put into their preparation.
name: German Food Corner (1024783-W)
address: Cable Car, Oriental Village, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Wan Thai Langkawi Restaurant is a must-visit for those who love authentic Thai cuisine. The restaurant is owned and operated by Thai individuals, ensuring that the dishes are bursting with genuine Thai flavors. The menu offers a variety of options including mango salad, pandan chicken, crispy fried squid, and of course, the classic tom yum soup. Customers have praised the creamy green curry with tender chicken pieces as a standout dish.
name: Wan Thai Langkawi Restaurant
address: 80-82 Langkawi Mall Dundung Langkawi, 07000 Kuah, Malaysia

detail_description: Kayuputi Langkawi is a restaurant located in the luxurious St. Regis Langkawi hotel, offering a stunning view of the sunset from its pier location. The interior decorations and ambiance make it a memorable dining spot, especially for dinner while watching the sunset. While some find the food to be average, others appreciate its value. Guests can enjoy signature cocktails like Mojo Mojito and Bloody Mary on the terrace, with Mojitos being particularly delicious.
name: Kayuputi Langkawi
address: Palau Langkawi Kedah MY, Jalan Pantai Beringin, 07000, Malaysia

detail_description: The Gulai House offers a great dining experience with delicious Malay cuisine. The satay is highly recommended, and the deep-fried grouper with Malay style sauces is a must-try. The restaurant's environment is beautiful, and the service staff are professional and friendly. Despite expectations of heavy and oily food, the dishes at The Gulai House are not too heavy, leaving no heartburn after meals. It's advisable to make reservations ahead of time to ensure a pleasant dining experience.
name: The Gulai House
address: Jln Teluk Datai, 07000 Pulau Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Boat Restaurant is a simple and quiet Chinese eatery located in Tengah Beach, Langkawi. Despite its unassuming appearance, the restaurant has gained popularity among locals and tourists for its delicious homemade tofu, stir-fried romaine lettuce, sweet & sour fish strips, salted egg squid, and butter prawns. The owner is known for insisting on the freshest produce from local fishermen.
name: Boat Restaurant
address: 2013, Jalan Pantai Tengah, Pantai Tengah, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: The Beach Grill at the Ritz Carlton Langkawi offers an exceptional dining experience with impeccable service and deliciously prepared food. The chef's expertise shines through in crafting personalized dishes, such as a delightful mango salad and surprise dinner creations. The restaurant's first-class service adds to the beautiful ambiance, with professional and attentive staff like Ms. Shar enhancing the overall experience. Guests can enjoy mesmerizing views during lunchtime while savoring delectable cocktails, including a standout Bloody Mary.
name: The Beach Grill
address: The Ritz-Carlton, Langkawi, PT 313, Jalan Pantai Kok, Teluk Nibong, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: The Spice Market Restaurant offers a diverse dining experience with a mix of Asian and Western cuisine. The restaurant is known for its friendly and efficient staff, as well as its excellent food selection representing various ethnic groups of Malaysia. Guests can enjoy dishes like Tom Yam seafood, som tam, black pepper beef, and more at reasonable prices. The breakfast buffet features both Asian and Western options, including rendang and masala tea.
name: Spice Market Restaurant
address: Meritus Pelangi Beach Resort & Spa, Langkawi Pantai Cenang, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Haroo+ Korean Restaurant in Langkawi is known for its exceptional customer service and authentic Korean dishes. The restaurant offers a warm and cozy ambiance, with the owners personally attending to guests. Diners have praised the delicious food, such as the fried pork mandu, beef soup, kimchi pancakes, Bibimbab, and Japchae. Portion sizes are generous and can be customized to suit preferences. Guests appreciate the complimentary appetizers and desserts provided by the friendly staff.
name: Haroo+ Korean Restaurant
address: Jalan Pandak Mayah 7, Pusat Bandar Kuah, 07000 Kuah, Kedah, Malaysia

name: Tide
address: The Westin Langkawi Resort & Spa, Jalan Dato Syed Omar, Kuah, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

name: Mare Blu Italian Restaurant
address: B5, B6 & B7, Perdana Quay, Telega Harbour Park, Jalan Pantai Kok, 07100 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

name: The Pavilion
address: Jln Teluk Datai, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

name: Melayu Malay Cuisine Restaurant
address: Jalan Teluk Baru, Jalan Pantai Tengah, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Islandish Family Seafood Restaurant is a popular dining spot in Pantai Cenang, Langkawi, known for its delicious and high-quality seafood dishes. Visitors have praised the friendly service and the delectable Thai Fried Rice. The restaurant's welcoming owners and clean, well-maintained environment add to the overall positive dining experience.
name: Islandish Family Seafood Restaurant
address: 41, Jalan Pantai Chenang, Kampung Lubok Buaya, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: CoCo's Bistro is a seaside dining spot with a beautiful sunset view and the sound of waves in the background. The menu offers well-prepared dishes like Irish Lamb Stew, Fish and Chips, and garlic cheese bread. It's recommended to make reservations due to limited seating. The place has a romantic ambiance, making it perfect for a dinner date or chilling with friends. The food is delicious, especially the Western dishes which are crispy and tasty.
name: CoCo's Bistro
address: coconut beach villa, Jalan Kuala Muda, 07100 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

detail_description: Arang BBQ & Grill is a popular dining spot known for its delicious food and friendly service. The menu features a variety of options, including BBQ beef ribs, BBQ fish, trio of dips, BBQ prawns, souvlaki lamb wrap, mix grill for 2 and chicken grill. Diners have praised the tenderness and flavor of the ribs as well as the tasty sea bass and rice. The restaurant also offers fresh pineapple juice and apple crumble for dessert.
name: Arang BBQ & Grill
address: OYO 276 green village, Jl. Teluk Baru, 07000 Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia
